greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. sin(log(1+x)).
formula: abs(a(n)) = abs(Re(product((k+I), k=1..(n-1)))) with I^2=-1. Example: abs(a(9))=55900 and product((k+I), k=1..(9-1)) = - 55900 + 46800 I => abs(part real of "product((k+I), k=1..(9-1))") = 55900. - _Yalcin Aktar_, Jul 02 2005
mathematica: FullSimplify[Table[-((-1)^n*(Gamma[1 + I]*Gamma[-I + n] + Gamma[1 - I]*Gamma[I + n])*Sinh[Pi]) / (2*Pi), {n, 0, 20}]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015 *)
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_
ext: Extended with signs by _Olivier Gérard_, Mar 15 1997
